page.title: 01Bradford West.
page.content: Our block of{Bradford West}contains a mixture of farmland,suburb and indust- rial premises with associated housing. The block is traversed by the valley of{Clayton Beck}whose water once pow- ered Bradford's{worsted industry.}Many of the victorian woollen mills are now either derelict or demolished.They are being replaced by light-industrial units and small housing developments. The 19th. century terraced housing has been either demolished in slum clear- ance schemes or improved to a standard far beyond the original.The block has a{multi-ethnic population}with many people,particularly those living near- est the city centre,having Pakistani, Bangladeshi or Indian backgrounds. Bradford University,Bradford + Ilkley Community College are in the block as are the city's two main hospitals- St. Luke's and Bradford Royal Infirmary.
